todolist.title: Set Up Version Control
todolist.description: Initialize a Git repository and configure remote origin on GitHub or GitLab.

todolist.title: Optimize Database Queries
todolist.description: Analyze slow queries and optimize indexing for better performance.

todolist.title: Implement Authentication
todolist.description: Integrate user authentication using OAuth, JWT, or session-based authentication.

todolist.title: Refactor Codebase
todolist.description: Improve code structure, remove redundancy, and enhance readability.

todolist.title: Write Unit Tests
todolist.description: Create test cases to cover critical functionalities using Jest or Mocha.

todolist.title: Setup CI/CD Pipeline
todolist.description: Configure continuous integration and deployment for automated builds and testing.

todolist.title: Improve Application Security
todolist.description: Conduct security audits, fix vulnerabilities, and implement best security practices.

todolist.title: Enhance UI/UX
todolist.description: Improve user interface elements and interactions based on user feedback.

todolist.title: Optimize API Performance
todolist.description: Reduce response times and optimize API calls for better efficiency.

todolist.title: Deploy to Production
todolist.description: Finalize testing and deploy the latest stable version to production servers.
